talk.author: did:plc:dzw7qpu5k2luhxlelvoxvaa6
talk.utter:
Started off as a homage to Urusei Yatsura and got hornier as it went on.

Momo, who should be considered the co-protagonist of the sequel manga, is a very unique and well-rounded character.

talk.utter: i'd say "i see" to the first part but i also never watched that either :wakaru:

talk.author: did:plc:dzw7qpu5k2luhxlelvoxvaa6
talk.utter: Alien princess with electric powers comes down to earth, bumps into an average loser and falls for him despite his protestations. Inserts herself between the guy and the girl he's in love with. Other aliens follow. I have just described the basic premise of both shows.
